p: Agri-food waste can increase the bioavailability of a large number of drugs as they are an excellent source of nutrients and phytochemical compounds capable of contributing to a healthy diet [ 297]. They are a good source of organic acids, sugars, and phenolic compounds such as flavonoids and anthocyanins, which have therapeutic applications due to their antibacterial, antifungal, anti-inflammatory, immunomodulatory activities under various conditions and an antioxidant potential against free radicals [ 298].
